"A.P.241/4/10/12:00": "Humph, humph! Stupid, stupid, stupid big bro! Just- He doesn't even know how I feel!"
"I know! I know, even if no one tells me! I know... more than anyone, that I'm lost at what to do!"
"Damn it! I'm getting more and more pissed the more I try to cool my head. As I thought, big bro, you're so STUPID!"
"What's wrong with not having a motive?! That's something you find along the way, right!? Now, Aru, you say something too!"
"W-What? What am I supposed to say?"
"Just say anything!"
"...I-I want to become bigger!"
"That's just a wish of yours!"
"Haha."
"Oh, I'm so sorry! Was I too noisy? ...of course I was."
"No no, I don't mind. I was just tracking an acquaintance's photons and ended up here instead."
"And then I heard a person shouting something interesting so I came to check it out. I'm sorry for interrupting, feel free to continue."
"Oh no, I didn't want to shout... well, I guess I do want to shout, but..."
"...Hey, you're an ARKS too, right?"
"Yes, my name is Matoi. I haven't seen you around before, you are...?"
"I'm Hitsugi, and this here is Aru and... we're kind of here due to some weird circumstances. Nice to meet you, Ms. Matoi."
"Hah, there's no need to be so formal, Hitsugi."
"With that, Hitsugi, are you okay? You seem like something is on your mind."
"Uhm, no... well... kind of."
"That outburst a moment ago... It was about something you couldn't stand, right? You can talk to me about it, if it helps."
"...Why would you go to such lengths for me?"
"Because I also try to hide things that bother me. I get scolded for it often, so I understand how you feel."
"I wonder why... this is our first time meeting, but I feel like I can tell you anything..."
"Well then, Matoi... can I ask you something?"
"Yes, feel free to ask me anything. I love talking with other people."
"Why do you fight? What's your motivation?"
"A reason for fighting, huh...? Why do you ask?"
"Someone told me 'You don't have a reason to fight.' I got really pissed off, but when I thought about it... I really didn't have a reason. That's weird... right?"
"...Hm, that is strange."
"Oh, no! I didn't mean you. It just... made me feel nostalgic. Like I was looking at my past self."
"Past self...?"
"There was a time when I lost my reason for fighting too. I was just following orders without a purpose, acting according to what I was told to do."
"I'm the same... I was just following orders from Mother."
"But that's no different from not thinking for yourself. So... I understand what my big bro meant."
"For what purpose do I use my power...?"

"……重要なのは、自分が何をしたいのか、だよ。
その答えが「誰かを守りたい」なら
それはれっきとした、ヒツギちゃんの意志だと思う。"

"自分が、何をしたいのか……
ううう……それがハッキリとわかれば
苦労しないのに……"

"だったらさ、まずは目の前のことを
一つ一つやっていったらいいんじゃないかな？
自分のやりたいことを、やっていくの。"
"自分のやりたいこと……"

"そう、他の人に決めてもらうんじゃなくて
自分で「それをやる」って決めること。
それが第一歩だよ、きっと。"
"……なんか、すこしわかった気がする。"

"そうよヒツギ、何を迷ってるのよ。
誰になんと言われようと、あたしは知りたいの。"

"マザーのやろうとしてることとか
どうしてアルが狙われているのか、とか
知って、知って……そして、決める！"

"ありがと、マトイ！
おかげで、道が見えた気がする！"

"アル、あんたはシエラのところで待ってて！
あたしはちょっと、行ってくるから！"
"ふふっ、元気な子だね。"

"アルくん、だっけ？\u3000それじゃわたしと一緒に
シエラちゃんのところに行こうか。
ちょうどわたしも呼ばれてたはずだから。"

"……お姉ちゃん、ぼくたち
前にどこかで会ったことある？"

"ううん、初めてだと思うよ。
でも……何でだろうね、わたしもなんだか
とっても懐かしい感じがするんだ。"
